title: (x) Izzy's Deli logo - Koloss {Stephen}

comments.content: After a quick search on MyFonts looking for fonts similar to [Broadway](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125220620/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/atf/broadway/), as this sample is certainly similar to that, I found [URW Martinique](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125220620/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/martinique/) to be the closest, but itâ€™s still not right.
